Sentencas: Degradation is one of the major issues affecting rSOFC (reversible solid oxide fuel cell) performance in both fuel cell and electrolysis mode operation.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Defect and even damage appeared on electrode microstructure may be associated with thermal stress and strain distribution appearing in the electrode sintering process.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics

Sentencas: It is necessary to investigate interactions and sintering process between material particles/clusters.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics

Sentencas: A bottom-up modeling approach employing CG-MD (coarse-graining molecular dynamics) method is developed to model the sintering process for the material particles in rSOFC fuel electrodes.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics

Sentencas: Based on the reconstructed porous electrode, various microstructural and thermal-mechanical properties are further evaluated for, e.g., porosity, triple-phase boundary length, and stress distribution.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics

Sentencas: The effects of the material composition, sintered temperature, pressure and nanoparticle size are also investigated and discussed.
Titulo: Modeling and evaluation of sintered microstructure and its properties for rSOFC fuel electrodes by coarse-grained molecular dynamics
